name: HP
desc: Hit points. A unit dies if their HP reaches 0.

name: Str
desc: Strength. Affects how much damage a unit inflicts when using physical weapons.

name: Atn
desc: Attunement. Affects how powerful a unit's shamanic abilities are.

name: Skill
desc: Skill. Affects unit's accuracy and hit rate.

name: Spd
desc: Speed. Affects a unit's avoid and attack speed.

name: Bless
desc: Blessing. How much a unit is favored by the Gods.

name: Def
desc: Defense. Reduces damage from physcial weapons.

name: Frt
desc: Fortitude. Reduces damage from shamanic attacks.

name: Move
desc: Movement. How many tiles a unit can move in one turn.
